name: NNReal.nnrpow_def
initialProofState:
a b : NNReal
⊢ Eq (a.nnrpow b) (HPow.hPow a ↑b)
decl: @[simp] lemma nnrpow_def (a b : ℝ≥0) : nnrpow a b = a ^ (b : ℝ) := rfl

name: NNReal.continuous_nnrpow_const
initialProofState:
y : NNReal
⊢ Continuous fun x => x.nnrpow y
decl:
@[fun_prop]
lemma continuous_nnrpow_const (y : ℝ≥0) : Continuous (nnrpow · y) :=
  continuous_rpow_const zero_le_coe

/- This is a "redeclaration" of the attribute to speed up the proofs in this file. -/

name: NNReal.monotone_nnrpow_const
initialProofState:
y : NNReal
⊢ Monotone fun x => x.nnrpow y
decl:
lemma monotone_nnrpow_const (y : ℝ≥0) : Monotone (nnrpow · y) :=
  monotone_rpow_of_nonneg zero_le_coe

name: CFC.nnrpow_eq_pow
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁶ : NonUnitalRing A
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝⁴ : StarRing A
inst✝³ : Module Real A
inst✝² : SMulCommClass Real A A
inst✝¹ : IsScalarTower Real A A
inst✝ : NonUnitalContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
a : A
y : NNReal
⊢ Eq (CFC.nnrpow a y) (HPow.hPow a y)
decl:
@[simp]
lemma nnrpow_eq_pow {a : A} {y : ℝ≥0} : nnrpow a y = a ^ y := rfl

name: CFC.nnrpow_nonneg
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁶ : NonUnitalRing A
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝⁴ : StarRing A
inst✝³ : Module Real A
inst✝² : SMulCommClass Real A A
inst✝¹ : IsScalarTower Real A A
inst✝ : NonUnitalContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
a : A
x : NNReal
⊢ LE.le 0 (HPow.hPow a x)
decl:
@[simp]
lemma nnrpow_nonneg {a : A} {x : ℝ≥0} : 0 ≤ a ^ x := cfcₙ_predicate _ a

name: CFC.nnrpow_def
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁶ : NonUnitalRing A
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝⁴ : StarRing A
inst✝³ : Module Real A
inst✝² : SMulCommClass Real A A
inst✝¹ : IsScalarTower Real A A
inst✝ : NonUnitalContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
a : A
y : NNReal
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow a y) (cfcₙ (fun x => x.nnrpow y) a)
decl: lemma nnrpow_def {a : A} {y : ℝ≥0} : a ^ y = cfcₙ (NNReal.nnrpow · y) a := rfl

name: CFC.nnrpow_add
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁶ : NonUnitalRing A
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝⁴ : StarRing A
inst✝³ : Module Real A
inst✝² : SMulCommClass Real A A
inst✝¹ : IsScalarTower Real A A
inst✝ : NonUnitalContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
a : A
x y : NNReal
hx : LT.lt 0 x
hy : LT.lt 0 y
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow a (HAdd.hAdd x y)) (HMul.hMul (HPow.hPow a x) (HPow.hPow a y))
decl:
lemma nnrpow_add {a : A} {x y : ℝ≥0} (hx : 0 < x) (hy : 0 < y) :
    a ^ (x + y) = a ^ x * a ^ y := by
  simp only [nnrpow_def]
  rw [← cfcₙ_mul _ _ a]
  congr! 2 with z
  exact mod_cast z.rpow_add' <| ne_of_gt (add_pos hx hy)

name: CFC.nnrpow_zero
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁶ : NonUnitalRing A
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝⁴ : StarRing A
inst✝³ : Module Real A
inst✝² : SMulCommClass Real A A
inst✝¹ : IsScalarTower Real A A
inst✝ : NonUnitalContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
a : A
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow a 0) 0
decl:
@[simp]
lemma nnrpow_zero {a : A} : a ^ (0 : ℝ≥0) = 0 := by
  simp [nnrpow_def, cfcₙ_apply_of_not_map_zero]

name: CFC.nnrpow_one
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁶ : NonUnitalRing A
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝⁴ : StarRing A
inst✝³ : Module Real A
inst✝² : SMulCommClass Real A A
inst✝¹ : IsScalarTower Real A A
inst✝ : NonUnitalContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
a : A
ha : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow a 1) a
decl:
lemma nnrpow_one (a : A) (ha : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) : a ^ (1 : ℝ≥0) = a := by
  simp only [nnrpow_def, NNReal.nnrpow_def, NNReal.coe_one, NNReal.rpow_one]
  change cfcₙ (id : ℝ≥0 → ℝ≥0) a = a
  rw [cfcₙ_id ℝ≥0 a]

name: CFC.nnrpow_two
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁶ : NonUnitalRing A
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝⁴ : StarRing A
inst✝³ : Module Real A
inst✝² : SMulCommClass Real A A
inst✝¹ : IsScalarTower Real A A
inst✝ : NonUnitalContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
a : A
ha : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow a 2) (HMul.hMul a a)
decl:
lemma nnrpow_two (a : A) (ha : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) : a ^ (2 : ℝ≥0) = a * a := by
  simp only [nnrpow_def, NNReal.nnrpow_def, NNReal.coe_ofNat, NNReal.rpow_ofNat, pow_two]
  change cfcₙ (fun z : ℝ≥0 => id z * id z) a = a * a
  rw [cfcₙ_mul id id a, cfcₙ_id ℝ≥0 a]

name: CFC.nnrpow_three
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁶ : NonUnitalRing A
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝⁴ : StarRing A
inst✝³ : Module Real A
inst✝² : SMulCommClass Real A A
inst✝¹ : IsScalarTower Real A A
inst✝ : NonUnitalContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
a : A
ha : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow a 3) (HMul.hMul (HMul.hMul a a) a)
decl:
lemma nnrpow_three (a : A) (ha : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) : a ^ (3 : ℝ≥0) = a * a * a := by
  simp only [nnrpow_def, NNReal.nnrpow_def, NNReal.coe_ofNat, NNReal.rpow_ofNat, pow_three]
  change cfcₙ (fun z : ℝ≥0 => id z * (id z * id z)) a = a * a * a
  rw [cfcₙ_mul id _ a, cfcₙ_mul id _ a, ← mul_assoc, cfcₙ_id ℝ≥0 a]

name: CFC.zero_nnrpow
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁶ : NonUnitalRing A
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝⁴ : StarRing A
inst✝³ : Module Real A
inst✝² : SMulCommClass Real A A
inst✝¹ : IsScalarTower Real A A
inst✝ : NonUnitalContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
x : NNReal
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow 0 x) 0
decl:
@[simp]
lemma zero_nnrpow {x : ℝ≥0} : (0 : A) ^ x = 0 := by simp [nnrpow_def]

name: CFC.nnrpow_nnrpow
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁹ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁸ : NonUnitalRing A
inst✝⁷ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝⁶ : StarRing A
inst✝⁵ : Module Real A
inst✝⁴ : SMulCommClass Real A A
inst✝³ : IsScalarTower Real A A
inst✝² : NonUnitalContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
inst✝¹ : TopologicalRing A
inst✝ : T2Space A
a : A
x y : NNReal
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow (HPow.hPow a x) y) (HPow.hPow a (HMul.hMul x y))
decl:
@[simp]
lemma nnrpow_nnrpow {a : A} {x y : ℝ≥0} : (a ^ x) ^ y = a ^ (x * y) := by
  by_cases ha : 0 ≤ a
  case pos =>
    obtain (rfl | hx) := eq_zero_or_pos x <;> obtain (rfl | hy) := eq_zero_or_pos y
    all_goals try simp
    simp only [nnrpow_def, NNReal.coe_mul]
    rw [← cfcₙ_comp _ _ a]
    congr! 2 with u
    ext
    simp [Real.rpow_mul]
  case neg =>
    simp [nnrpow_def, cfcₙ_apply_of_not_predicate a ha]

name: CFC.nnrpow_nnrpow_inv
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁹ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁸ : NonUnitalRing A
inst✝⁷ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝⁶ : StarRing A
inst✝⁵ : Module Real A
inst✝⁴ : SMulCommClass Real A A
inst✝³ : IsScalarTower Real A A
inst✝² : NonUnitalContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
inst✝¹ : TopologicalRing A
inst✝ : T2Space A
a : A
x : NNReal
hx : Ne x 0
ha : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow (HPow.hPow a x) (Inv.inv x)) a
decl:
lemma nnrpow_nnrpow_inv (a : A) {x : ℝ≥0} (hx : x ≠ 0) (ha : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) :
    (a ^ x) ^ x⁻¹ = a := by
  simp [mul_inv_cancel₀ hx, nnrpow_one _ ha]

name: CFC.nnrpow_inv_nnrpow
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁹ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁸ : NonUnitalRing A
inst✝⁷ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝⁶ : StarRing A
inst✝⁵ : Module Real A
inst✝⁴ : SMulCommClass Real A A
inst✝³ : IsScalarTower Real A A
inst✝² : NonUnitalContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
inst✝¹ : TopologicalRing A
inst✝ : T2Space A
a : A
x : NNReal
hx : Ne x 0
ha : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow (HPow.hPow a (Inv.inv x)) x) a
decl:
lemma nnrpow_inv_nnrpow (a : A) {x : ℝ≥0} (hx : x ≠ 0) (ha : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) :
    (a ^ x⁻¹) ^ x = a := by
  simp [inv_mul_cancel₀ hx, nnrpow_one _ ha]

name: CFC.nnrpow_inv_eq
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁹ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁸ : NonUnitalRing A
inst✝⁷ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝⁶ : StarRing A
inst✝⁵ : Module Real A
inst✝⁴ : SMulCommClass Real A A
inst✝³ : IsScalarTower Real A A
inst✝² : NonUnitalContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
inst✝¹ : TopologicalRing A
inst✝ : T2Space A
a b : A
x : NNReal
hx : Ne x 0
ha : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
hb : autoParam (LE.le 0 b) _auto✝
⊢ Iff (Eq (HPow.hPow a (Inv.inv x)) b) (Eq (HPow.hPow b x) a)
decl:
lemma nnrpow_inv_eq (a b : A) {x : ℝ≥0} (hx : x ≠ 0) (ha : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac)
    (hb : 0 ≤ b := by cfc_tac) : a ^ x⁻¹ = b ↔ b ^ x = a :=
  ⟨fun h ↦ nnrpow_inv_nnrpow a hx ▸ congr($(h) ^ x).symm,
    fun h ↦ nnrpow_nnrpow_inv b hx ▸ congr($(h) ^ x⁻¹).symm⟩

name: CFC.sqrt_nonneg
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁶ : NonUnitalRing A
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝⁴ : StarRing A
inst✝³ : Module Real A
inst✝² : SMulCommClass Real A A
inst✝¹ : IsScalarTower Real A A
inst✝ : NonUnitalContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
a : A
⊢ LE.le 0 (CFC.sqrt a)
decl:
@[simp]
lemma sqrt_nonneg {a : A} : 0 ≤ sqrt a := cfcₙ_predicate _ a

name: CFC.sqrt_eq_nnrpow
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁶ : NonUnitalRing A
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝⁴ : StarRing A
inst✝³ : Module Real A
inst✝² : SMulCommClass Real A A
inst✝¹ : IsScalarTower Real A A
inst✝ : NonUnitalContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
a : A
⊢ Eq (CFC.sqrt a) (HPow.hPow a (1 / 2))
decl:
lemma sqrt_eq_nnrpow {a : A} : sqrt a = a ^ (1 / 2 : ℝ≥0) := by
  simp only [sqrt, nnrpow, NNReal.coe_inv, NNReal.coe_ofNat, NNReal.rpow_eq_pow]
  congr
  ext
  exact_mod_cast NNReal.sqrt_eq_rpow _

name: CFC.sqrt_zero
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁶ : NonUnitalRing A
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝⁴ : StarRing A
inst✝³ : Module Real A

inst✝¹ : IsScalarTower Real A A
inst✝ : NonUnitalContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
⊢ Eq (CFC.sqrt 0) 0
decl:
@[simp]
lemma sqrt_zero : sqrt (0 : A) = 0 := by simp [sqrt]

name: CFC.nnrpow_sqrt
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁹ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁸ : NonUnitalRing A
inst✝⁷ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝⁶ : StarRing A
inst✝⁵ : Module Real A
inst✝⁴ : SMulCommClass Real A A
inst✝³ : IsScalarTower Real A A
inst✝² : NonUnitalContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
inst✝¹ : TopologicalRing A
inst✝ : T2Space A
a : A
x : NNReal
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow (CFC.sqrt a) x) (HPow.hPow a (HDiv.hDiv x 2))
decl:
@[simp]
lemma nnrpow_sqrt {a : A} {x : ℝ≥0} : (sqrt a) ^ x = a ^ (x / 2) := by
  rw [sqrt_eq_nnrpow, nnrpow_nnrpow, one_div_mul_eq_div 2 x]

name: CFC.nnrpow_sqrt_two
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁹ : PartialOrder A

inst✝¹ : TopologicalRing A
inst✝ : T2Space A
a : A
ha : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow (CFC.sqrt a) 2) a
decl:
lemma nnrpow_sqrt_two (a : A) (ha : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) : (sqrt a) ^ (2 : ℝ≥0) = a := by
  simp only [nnrpow_sqrt, ne_eq, OfNat.ofNat_ne_zero, not_false_eq_true, div_self]
  rw [nnrpow_one a]

name: CFC.sqrt_mul_sqrt_self
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁹ : PartialOrder A

a : A
ha : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (HMul.hMul (CFC.sqrt a) (CFC.sqrt a)) a
decl:
lemma sqrt_mul_sqrt_self (a : A) (ha : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) : sqrt a * sqrt a = a := by
  rw [← nnrpow_two _, nnrpow_sqrt_two _]

name: CFC.sqrt_nnrpow
initialProofState:

⊢ Eq (CFC.sqrt (HPow.hPow a x)) (HPow.hPow a (HDiv.hDiv x 2))
decl:
@[simp]
lemma sqrt_nnrpow {a : A} {x : ℝ≥0} : sqrt (a ^ x) = a ^ (x / 2) := by
  simp [sqrt_eq_nnrpow, div_eq_mul_inv]

name: CFC.sqrt_nnrpow_two
initialProofState:

lemma sqrt_nnrpow_two (a : A) (ha : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) : sqrt (a ^ (2 : ℝ≥0)) = a := by
  simp only [sqrt_nnrpow, ne_eq, OfNat.ofNat_ne_zero, not_false_eq_true, div_self]

name: CFC.sqrt_mul_self
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁹ : PartialOrder A

inst✝⁶ : StarRing A

inst✝¹ : TopologicalRing A
inst✝ : T2Space A
a : A
ha : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (CFC.sqrt (HMul.hMul a a)) a
decl:
lemma sqrt_mul_self (a : A) (ha : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) : sqrt (a * a) = a := by
  rw [← nnrpow_two _, sqrt_nnrpow_two _]

name: CFC.mul_self_eq
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁹ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁸ : NonUnitalRing A
inst✝⁷ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝⁶ : StarRing A
inst✝⁵ : Module Real A
inst✝⁴ : SMulCommClass Real A A
inst✝³ : IsScalarTower Real A A
inst✝² : NonUnitalContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
inst✝¹ : TopologicalRing A
inst✝ : T2Space A
a b : A
h : Eq (CFC.sqrt a) b
ha : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (HMul.hMul b b) a
decl:
lemma mul_self_eq {a b : A} (h : sqrt a = b) (ha : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) :
    b * b = a :=
  h ▸ sqrt_mul_sqrt_self _ ha

name: CFC.sqrt_unique
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁹ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁸ : NonUnitalRing A
inst✝⁷ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝⁶ : StarRing A
inst✝⁵ : Module Real A
inst✝⁴ : SMulCommClass Real A A
inst✝³ : IsScalarTower Real A A
inst✝² : NonUnitalContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
inst✝¹ : TopologicalRing A
inst✝ : T2Space A
a b : A
h : Eq (HMul.hMul b b) a
hb : autoParam (LE.le 0 b) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (CFC.sqrt a) b
decl:
lemma sqrt_unique {a b : A} (h : b * b = a) (hb : 0 ≤ b := by cfc_tac) :
    sqrt a = b :=
  h ▸ sqrt_mul_self b

name: CFC.sqrt_eq_iff
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁹ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁸ : NonUnitalRing A
inst✝⁷ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝⁶ : StarRing A
inst✝⁵ : Module Real A
inst✝⁴ : SMulCommClass Real A A
inst✝³ : IsScalarTower Real A A
inst✝² : NonUnitalContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
inst✝¹ : TopologicalRing A
inst✝ : T2Space A
a b : A
ha : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
hb : autoParam (LE.le 0 b) _auto✝
⊢ Iff (Eq (CFC.sqrt a) b) (Eq (HMul.hMul b b) a)
decl:
lemma sqrt_eq_iff (a b : A) (ha : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) (hb : 0 ≤ b := by cfc_tac) :
    sqrt a = b ↔ b * b = a :=
  ⟨(mul_self_eq ·), (sqrt_unique ·)⟩

name: CFC.sqrt_eq_zero_iff
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁹ : PartialOrder A

inst✝⁶ : StarRing A

inst✝¹ : TopologicalRing A
inst✝ : T2Space A
a : A
ha : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
⊢ Iff (Eq (CFC.sqrt a) 0) (Eq a 0)
decl:
lemma sqrt_eq_zero_iff (a : A) (ha : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) : sqrt a = 0 ↔ a = 0 := by
  rw [sqrt_eq_iff a _, mul_zero, eq_comm]

name: CFC.rpow_eq_pow
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁵ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁴ : Ring A
inst✝³ : StarRing A
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝¹ : Algebra Real A
inst✝ : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
a : A
y : Real
⊢ Eq (CFC.rpow a y) (HPow.hPow a y)
decl:
@[simp]
lemma rpow_eq_pow {a : A} {y : ℝ} : rpow a y = a ^ y := rfl

name: CFC.rpow_nonneg
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁵ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁴ : Ring A
inst✝³ : StarRing A
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝¹ : Algebra Real A
inst✝ : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
a : A
y : Real
⊢ LE.le 0 (HPow.hPow a y)
decl:
@[simp]
lemma rpow_nonneg {a : A} {y : ℝ} : 0 ≤ a ^ y := cfc_predicate _ a

name: CFC.rpow_def
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁵ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁴ : Ring A
inst✝³ : StarRing A
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝¹ : Algebra Real A
inst✝ : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
a : A
y : Real
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow a y) (cfc (fun x => HPow.hPow x y) a)
decl: lemma rpow_def {a : A} {y : ℝ} : a ^ y = cfc (fun x : ℝ≥0 => x ^ y) a := rfl

name: CFC.rpow_one
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁵ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁴ : Ring A
inst✝³ : StarRing A
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝¹ : Algebra Real A
inst✝ : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
a : A
ha : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow a 1) a
decl:
lemma rpow_one (a : A) (ha : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) : a ^ (1 : ℝ) = a := by
  simp only [rpow_def, NNReal.coe_one, NNReal.rpow_eq_pow, NNReal.rpow_one, cfc_id' ℝ≥0 a]

name: CFC.one_rpow
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁵ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁴ : Ring A
inst✝³ : StarRing A
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝¹ : Algebra Real A
inst✝ : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
x : Real
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow 1 x) 1
decl:
@[simp]
lemma one_rpow {x : ℝ} : (1 : A) ^ x = (1 : A) := by simp [rpow_def]

name: CFC.rpow_zero
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁵ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁴ : Ring A
inst✝³ : StarRing A
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝¹ : Algebra Real A
inst✝ : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
a : A
ha : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow a 0) 1
decl:
lemma rpow_zero (a : A) (ha : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) : a ^ (0 : ℝ) = 1 := by
  simp [rpow_def, cfc_const_one ℝ≥0 a]

name: CFC.zero_rpow
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁵ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁴ : Ring A
inst✝³ : StarRing A
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝¹ : Algebra Real A
inst✝ : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
x : Real
hx : Ne x 0
⊢ Eq (CFC.rpow 0 x) 0
decl: lemma zero_rpow {x : ℝ} (hx : x ≠ 0) : rpow (0 : A) x = 0 := by simp [rpow, NNReal.zero_rpow hx]

name: CFC.rpow_natCast
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁵ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁴ : Ring A
inst✝³ : StarRing A
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝¹ : Algebra Real A
inst✝ : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
a : A
n : Nat
ha : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow a ↑n) (HPow.hPow a n)
decl:
lemma rpow_natCast (a : A) (n : ℕ) (ha : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) : a ^ (n : ℝ) = a ^ n := by
  rw [← cfc_pow_id (R := ℝ≥0) a n, rpow_def]
  congr
  simp

name: CFC.rpow_algebraMap
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁵ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁴ : Ring A
inst✝³ : StarRing A
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝¹ : Algebra Real A
inst✝ : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
x : NNReal
y : Real
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow ((algebraMap NNReal A) x) y) ((algebraMap NNReal A) (HPow.hPow x y))
decl:
@[simp]
lemma rpow_algebraMap {x : ℝ≥0} {y : ℝ} :
    (algebraMap ℝ≥0 A x) ^ y = algebraMap ℝ≥0 A (x ^ y) := by
  rw [rpow_def, cfc_algebraMap ..]

name: CFC.rpow_add
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁵ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁴ : Ring A
inst✝³ : StarRing A
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝¹ : Algebra Real A
inst✝ : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
a : A
x y : Real
ha : Not (Membership.mem (spectrum NNReal a) 0)
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow a (HAdd.hAdd x y)) (HMul.hMul (HPow.hPow a x) (HPow.hPow a y))
decl:
lemma rpow_add {a : A} {x y : ℝ} (ha : 0 ∉ spectrum ℝ≥0 a) :
    a ^ (x + y) = a ^ x * a ^ y := by
  simp only [rpow_def, NNReal.rpow_eq_pow]
  rw [← cfc_mul _ _ a]
  refine cfc_congr ?_
  intro z hz
  have : z ≠ 0 := by aesop
  simp [NNReal.rpow_add this _ _]

-- TODO: relate to a strict positivity condition

name: CFC.rpow_rpow
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁶ : Ring A
inst✝⁵ : StarRing A
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝³ : Algebra Real A
inst✝² : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
inst✝¹ : TopologicalRing A
inst✝ : T2Space A
a : A
x y : Real
ha₁ : Not (Membership.mem (spectrum NNReal a) 0)
hx : Ne x 0
ha₂ : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow (HPow.hPow a x) y) (HPow.hPow a (HMul.hMul x y))
decl:
lemma rpow_rpow [TopologicalRing A] [T2Space A]
    (a : A) (x y : ℝ) (ha₁ : 0 ∉ spectrum ℝ≥0 a) (hx : x ≠ 0) (ha₂ : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) :
    (a ^ x) ^ y = a ^ (x * y) := by
  simp only [rpow_def]
  rw [← cfc_comp _ _ a ha₂]
  refine cfc_congr fun _ _ => ?_
  simp [NNReal.rpow_mul]

name: CFC.rpow_rpow_of_exponent_nonneg
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁶ : Ring A
inst✝⁵ : StarRing A
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝³ : Algebra Real A
inst✝² : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
inst✝¹ : TopologicalRing A
inst✝ : T2Space A
a : A
x y : Real
hx : LE.le 0 x
hy : LE.le 0 y
ha₂ : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow (HPow.hPow a x) y) (HPow.hPow a (HMul.hMul x y))
decl:
lemma rpow_rpow_of_exponent_nonneg [TopologicalRing A] [T2Space A] (a : A) (x y : ℝ)
    (hx : 0 ≤ x) (hy : 0 ≤ y) (ha₂ : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) : (a ^ x) ^ y = a ^ (x * y) := by
  simp only [rpow_def]
  rw [← cfc_comp _ _ a]
  refine cfc_congr fun _ _ => ?_
  simp [NNReal.rpow_mul]

name: CFC.rpow_mul_rpow_neg
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁵ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁴ : Ring A
inst✝³ : StarRing A
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝¹ : Algebra Real A
inst✝ : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
a : A
x : Real
ha : Not (Membership.mem (spectrum NNReal a) 0)
ha' : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (HMul.hMul (HPow.hPow a x) (HPow.hPow a (Neg.neg x))) 1
decl:
lemma rpow_mul_rpow_neg {a : A} (x : ℝ) (ha : 0 ∉ spectrum ℝ≥0 a)
    (ha' : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) : a ^ x * a ^ (-x) = 1 := by
  rw [← rpow_add ha, add_neg_cancel, rpow_zero a]

name: CFC.rpow_neg_mul_rpow
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁵ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁴ : Ring A
inst✝³ : StarRing A
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝¹ : Algebra Real A
inst✝ : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
a : A
x : Real
ha : Not (Membership.mem (spectrum NNReal a) 0)
ha' : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (HMul.hMul (HPow.hPow a (Neg.neg x)) (HPow.hPow a x)) 1
decl:
lemma rpow_neg_mul_rpow {a : A} (x : ℝ) (ha : 0 ∉ spectrum ℝ≥0 a)
    (ha' : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) : a ^ (-x) * a ^ x = 1 := by
  rw [← rpow_add ha, neg_add_cancel, rpow_zero a]

name: CFC.rpow_neg_one_eq_inv
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁵ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁴ : Ring A
inst✝³ : StarRing A
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝¹ : Algebra Real A
inst✝ : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
a : Units A
ha : autoParam (LE.le 0 ↑a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow (↑a) (-1)) ↑(Inv.inv a)
decl:
lemma rpow_neg_one_eq_inv (a : Aˣ) (ha : (0 : A) ≤ a := by cfc_tac) :
    a ^ (-1 : ℝ) = (↑a⁻¹ : A) := by
  refine a.inv_eq_of_mul_eq_one_left ?_ |>.symm
  simpa [rpow_one (a : A)] using rpow_neg_mul_rpow 1 (spectrum.zero_not_mem ℝ≥0 a.isUnit)

name: CFC.rpow_neg_one_eq_cfc_inv
initialProofState:
A : Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : PartialOrder A
inst✝³ : NormedRing A
inst✝² : StarRing A
inst✝¹ : NormedAlgebra Real A
inst✝ : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun x => LE.le 0 x
a : A
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow a (-1)) (cfc (fun x => Inv.inv x) a)
decl:
lemma rpow_neg_one_eq_cfc_inv {A : Type*} [PartialOrder A] [NormedRing A] [StarRing A]
    [NormedAlgebra ℝ A] [ContinuousFunctionalCalculus ℝ≥0 ((0 : A) ≤ ·)] (a : A) :
    a ^ (-1 : ℝ) = cfc (·⁻¹ : ℝ≥0 → ℝ≥0) a :=
  cfc_congr fun x _ ↦ NNReal.rpow_neg_one x

name: CFC.rpow_neg
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁶ : Ring A
inst✝⁵ : StarRing A
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝³ : Algebra Real A
inst✝² : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
inst✝¹ : TopologicalRing A
inst✝ : T2Space A
a : Units A
x : Real
ha' : autoParam (LE.le 0 ↑a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow (↑a) (Neg.neg x)) (HPow.hPow (↑(Inv.inv a)) x)
decl:
lemma rpow_neg [TopologicalRing A] [T2Space A] (a : Aˣ) (x : ℝ)
    (ha' : (0 : A) ≤ a := by cfc_tac) : (a : A) ^ (-x) = (↑a⁻¹ : A) ^ x := by
  suffices h₁ : ContinuousOn (fun z ↦ z ^ x) (Inv.inv '' (spectrum ℝ≥0 (a : A))) by
    rw [← cfc_inv_id (R := ℝ≥0) a, rpow_def, rpow_def,
        ← cfc_comp' (fun z => z ^ x) (Inv.inv : ℝ≥0 → ℝ≥0) (a : A) h₁]
    refine cfc_congr fun _ _ => ?_
    simp [NNReal.rpow_neg, NNReal.inv_rpow]
  refine NNReal.continuousOn_rpow_const (.inl ?_)
  rintro ⟨z, hz, hz'⟩
  exact spectrum.zero_not_mem ℝ≥0 a.isUnit <| inv_eq_zero.mp hz' ▸ hz

name: CFC.rpow_intCast
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁵ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁴ : Ring A
inst✝³ : StarRing A
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝¹ : Algebra Real A
inst✝ : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
a : Units A
n : Int
ha : autoParam (LE.le 0 ↑a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow ↑a ↑n) ↑(HPow.hPow a n)
decl:
lemma rpow_intCast (a : Aˣ) (n : ℤ) (ha : (0 : A) ≤ a := by cfc_tac) :
    (a : A) ^ (n : ℝ) = (↑(a ^ n) : A) := by
  rw [← cfc_zpow (R := ℝ≥0) a n, rpow_def]
  refine cfc_congr fun _ _ => ?_
  simp

name: CFC.nnrpow_eq_rpow
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁶ : Ring A
inst✝⁵ : StarRing A
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝³ : Algebra Real A
inst✝² : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
inst✝¹ : TopologicalRing A
inst✝ : T2Space A
a : A
x : NNReal
hx : LT.lt 0 x
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow a x) (HPow.hPow a ↑x)
decl:
lemma nnrpow_eq_rpow {a : A} {x : ℝ≥0} (hx : 0 < x) : a ^ x = a ^ (x : ℝ) := by
  rw [nnrpow_def (A := A), rpow_def, cfcₙ_eq_cfc]

name: CFC.sqrt_eq_rpow
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁶ : Ring A
inst✝⁵ : StarRing A
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝³ : Algebra Real A
inst✝² : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
inst✝¹ : TopologicalRing A
inst✝ : T2Space A
a : A
⊢ Eq (CFC.sqrt a) (HPow.hPow a (1 / 2))
decl:
lemma sqrt_eq_rpow {a : A} : sqrt a = a ^ (1 / 2 : ℝ) := by
  have : a ^ (1 / 2 : ℝ) = a ^ ((1 / 2 : ℝ≥0) : ℝ) := rfl
  rw [this, ← nnrpow_eq_rpow (by norm_num), sqrt_eq_nnrpow (A := A)]

name: CFC.sqrt_eq_cfc
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁶ : Ring A
inst✝⁵ : StarRing A
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝³ : Algebra Real A
inst✝² : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
inst✝¹ : TopologicalRing A
inst✝ : T2Space A
a : A
⊢ Eq (CFC.sqrt a) (cfc (⇑NNReal.sqrt) a)
decl:
lemma sqrt_eq_cfc {a : A} : sqrt a = cfc NNReal.sqrt a := by
  unfold sqrt
  rw [cfcₙ_eq_cfc]

name: CFC.sqrt_sq
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁶ : Ring A
inst✝⁵ : StarRing A
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝³ : Algebra Real A
inst✝² : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
inst✝¹ : TopologicalRing A
inst✝ : T2Space A
a : A
ha : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (CFC.sqrt (HPow.hPow a 2)) a
decl:
lemma sqrt_sq (a : A) (ha : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) : sqrt (a ^ 2) = a := by
  rw [pow_two, sqrt_mul_self (A := A) a]

name: CFC.sq_sqrt
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁶ : Ring A
inst✝⁵ : StarRing A
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝³ : Algebra Real A
inst✝² : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
inst✝¹ : TopologicalRing A
inst✝ : T2Space A
a : A
ha : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow (CFC.sqrt a) 2) a
decl:
lemma sq_sqrt (a : A) (ha : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) : (sqrt a) ^ 2 = a := by
  rw [pow_two, sqrt_mul_sqrt_self (A := A) a]

name: CFC.sqrt_algebraMap
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁶ : Ring A
inst✝⁵ : StarRing A
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝³ : Algebra Real A
inst✝² : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
inst✝¹ : TopologicalRing A
inst✝ : T2Space A
r : NNReal
⊢ Eq (CFC.sqrt ((algebraMap NNReal A) r)) ((algebraMap NNReal A) (NNReal.sqrt r))
decl:
@[simp]
lemma sqrt_algebraMap {r : ℝ≥0} : sqrt (algebraMap ℝ≥0 A r) = algebraMap ℝ≥0 A (NNReal.sqrt r) := by
  rw [sqrt_eq_cfc, cfc_algebraMap]

name: CFC.sqrt_one
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁶ : Ring A
inst✝⁵ : StarRing A
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝³ : Algebra Real A
inst✝² : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
inst✝¹ : TopologicalRing A
inst✝ : T2Space A
⊢ Eq (CFC.sqrt 1) 1
decl:
@[simp]
lemma sqrt_one : sqrt (1 : A) = 1 := by simp [sqrt_eq_cfc]

-- TODO: relate to a strict positivity condition

name: CFC.sqrt_rpow
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁶ : Ring A
inst✝⁵ : StarRing A
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝³ : Algebra Real A
inst✝² : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
inst✝¹ : TopologicalRing A
inst✝ : T2Space A
a : A
x : Real
h : Not (Membership.mem (spectrum NNReal a) 0)
hx : Ne x 0
⊢ Eq (CFC.sqrt (HPow.hPow a x)) (HPow.hPow a (HDiv.hDiv x 2))
decl:
lemma sqrt_rpow {a : A} {x : ℝ} (h : 0 ∉ spectrum ℝ≥0 a)
    (hx : x ≠ 0) : sqrt (a ^ x) = a ^ (x / 2) := by
  by_cases hnonneg : 0 ≤ a
  case pos =>
    simp only [sqrt_eq_rpow, div_eq_mul_inv, one_mul, rpow_rpow _ _ _ h hx]
  case neg =>
    simp [sqrt_eq_cfc, rpow_def, cfc_apply_of_not_predicate a hnonneg]

-- TODO: relate to a strict positivity condition

name: CFC.rpow_sqrt
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁶ : Ring A
inst✝⁵ : StarRing A
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝³ : Algebra Real A
inst✝² : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
inst✝¹ : TopologicalRing A
inst✝ : T2Space A
a : A
x : Real
h : Not (Membership.mem (spectrum NNReal a) 0)
ha : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow (CFC.sqrt a) x) (HPow.hPow a (HDiv.hDiv x 2))
decl:
lemma rpow_sqrt (a : A) (x : ℝ) (h : 0 ∉ spectrum ℝ≥0 a)
    (ha : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) : (sqrt a) ^ x = a ^ (x / 2) := by
  rw [sqrt_eq_rpow, div_eq_mul_inv, one_mul,
      rpow_rpow _ _ _ h (by norm_num), inv_mul_eq_div]

name: CFC.sqrt_rpow_nnreal
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁶ : Ring A
inst✝⁵ : StarRing A
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝³ : Algebra Real A
inst✝² : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
inst✝¹ : TopologicalRing A
inst✝ : T2Space A
a : A
x : NNReal
⊢ Eq (CFC.sqrt (HPow.hPow a ↑x)) (HPow.hPow a (HDiv.hDiv (↑x) 2))
decl:
lemma sqrt_rpow_nnreal {a : A} {x : ℝ≥0} : sqrt (a ^ (x : ℝ)) = a ^ (x / 2 : ℝ) := by
  by_cases htriv : 0 ≤ a
  case neg => simp [sqrt_eq_cfc, rpow_def, cfc_apply_of_not_predicate a htriv]
  case pos =>
    by_cases hx : x = 0
    case pos => simp [hx, rpow_zero _ htriv]
    case neg =>
      have h₁ : 0 < x := lt_of_le_of_ne (by simp) (Ne.symm hx)
      have h₂ : (x : ℝ) / 2 = NNReal.toReal (x / 2) := rfl
      have h₃ : 0 < x / 2 := by positivity
      rw [← nnrpow_eq_rpow h₁, h₂, ← nnrpow_eq_rpow h₃, sqrt_nnrpow (A := A)]

name: CFC.rpow_sqrt_nnreal
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : PartialOrder A
inst✝⁶ : Ring A
inst✝⁵ : StarRing A
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝³ : Algebra Real A
inst✝² : ContinuousFunctionalCalculus NNReal fun a => LE.le 0 a
inst✝¹ : TopologicalRing A
inst✝ : T2Space A
a : A
x : NNReal
ha : autoParam (LE.le 0 a) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow (CFC.sqrt a) ↑x) (HPow.hPow a (HDiv.hDiv (↑x) 2))
decl:
lemma rpow_sqrt_nnreal {a : A} {x : ℝ≥0}
    (ha : 0 ≤ a := by cfc_tac) : (sqrt a) ^ (x : ℝ) = a ^ (x / 2 : ℝ) := by
  by_cases hx : x = 0
  case pos =>
    have ha' : 0 ≤ sqrt a := by exact sqrt_nonneg
    simp [hx, rpow_zero _ ha', rpow_zero _ ha]
  case neg =>
    have h₁ : 0 ≤ (x : ℝ) := by exact NNReal.zero_le_coe
    rw [sqrt_eq_rpow, rpow_rpow_of_exponent_nonneg _ _ _ (by norm_num) h₁, one_div_mul_eq_div]
